channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Partner Engagement Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Partner Engagement Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-43045|2024-09-11T14:15:35.899Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.1.2, 6.2.0, and 6.2.2 could allow a remote user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper authentication. IBM X-Force ID: 266896.

item.title: CVE-2023-38722|2024-09-11T14:17:25.153Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.1.2, 6.2.0, and 6.2.2 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 262174.

item.title: CVE-2022-35640|2024-07-22T14:36:41.814Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.2.2 could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned. IBM X-Force ID: 230933.

item.title: CVE-2022-35640|2024-08-03T09:36:44.407Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.2.2 could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned. IBM X-Force ID: 230933.
